tool_description: Tracks and analyzes behavioral trends over time to identify evolving risk patterns and predict future customer behavior changes.

tracking_period_days.description: Number of days to analyze for trend detection

trend_indicators.description: Behavioral indicators to track for trends

trend_sensitivity.description: Sensitivity for trend detection: low, medium, or high

error_messages: Invalid tracking period: tracking_period_days must be between 30 and 730 days
Invalid trend indicators: trend_indicators must contain valid behavioral metrics
Invalid sensitivity: trend_sensitivity must be one of [low, medium, high]
Insufficient historical data: Customer lacks sufficient data for trend analysis
usage: Specify customer_id, tracking_period_days, and trend_indicators array, then set trend_sensitivity for appropriate trend detection granularity.

detected_trends.description: Identified behavioral trends and their directions

trend_strength.description: Strength scores for each detected trend

risk_trajectory.description: Predicted risk trajectory based on current trends

trend_stability.description: Stability score of observed behavioral patterns
